taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section discolores;

key_statement.statement: Canes canescent toward tips; panicle thyrsiform-subcylindric, its prickles falcate
Canes nearly or quite glabrous; panicle, when well developed, pyramidal, its prickles straight
